articles.content: Uncomfortable pressure, fullness, squeezing, or pain in the centre of the chest that may come and go.

articles.author: Zania Stamataki
articles.title: Childhood pneumonia is surging in many countries – while the germs causing it are known, the effect of co-infections aren't - The Conversation
articles.description: Hybrid viruses can emerge from co-infections. And we don’t know their effects.
articles.content: You may have heard reports about outbreaks of pneumonia affecting children in the Netherlands, Denmark and parts of the US and China, which are higher than usual for this time of year. Parents are ke… [+4542 chars]
